Text:
Has the same hash as available earlier on Demonoid.  Fair quaility with a distorted ratio, but very viewable.  Particularly if you have VLC were you can alter the aspect. 

Thanx SkepticalE.
I disagree, the visual quality is really off and there is this really annoying background noice durring the entire episode (perhaps it is the ghosts). I'm hoping for a better rip.
Yes, quality really sucks, and I'm very tolerable concerning quality

Well, at any rate, I've certainely downloaded much worse files (here and elsewhere).  I did mispeak about the VLC changing aspect ratio.  It's Media Player Classic that will easily do that... >View>Pan&Scan.  VLC might do this, but I don't know where.
This is the "Ghost Buster" episode with shitty mpg quality, noisy audio and incorrect aspect ratio.
